Tip:
It's useless to attack Greyoll directly. To defeat her you need to defeat

Cheese Tip:
Hide by Greyoll's left leg and attack. Stay hidden until the other
                    dragons stop looking. A weapon with a bleed effect is recommended.

bosses.name: Thiollier
bosses.info:
After taking St. Trina's poison 4 times she will respond after you die, when you respawn Thiollier
                    will start talking. Once Thiollier is finished talking tell them what St. Trina told you, they will
                    deny that you are the chosen giving you the option to tell them again.
                    Once you told them again talk to them again and they will threaten you. Dying to St. Trina again
                    will give more dialogue with her, once you respawn Thiollier will invade you.
You will get the
St. Trina's
                      Smile
talisman from this

bosses.name: Needle Knight Leda
bosses.info:
Location:
In the Cleansing Chamber. Depending on your choices during questlines,
                    additional characters may be present:
Additional Enemies:
Dryleaf Dane: Always. Drops
Dane's
                        Footwork
Hornsent: If
Hornsent's
                        Questline
has been progressed until the last step. Drops
Hornsent's
                        Armor
and
Falx
.
Potential Allies:
Sir Ansbach: If
Sir Ansbach's
                        Questline
has been progressed until the last step, and you sided with him during
Leda's Questline
                        (2nd battle)
Sanguine Noble Nataan: If
Sir Ansbach's
                        Questline
has been progressed until the last step, and you skipped
Leda's Questline
                        (2nd battle)
.
Loot:
Leda's
                        Sword

bosses.name: Elden Beast
bosses.info:
Location:
Within the Erdtree. It is part two of the final boss fight. It will
                    automatically begin on defeating
Radagon of the
                      Golden Order

                      Remembrance
Note:
The Elden Beast is considered a God, with a unique message appearing upon
                    defeat, "God Slain".
